content:
# I successfully harvested 10 coal, and it is now in my inventory. This is a great start!
# 
# Now, I need to craft a burner mining drill to begin mining iron ore. I will check the crafting requirements for the burner mining drill to ensure I have everything needed.

# Let's retrieve the recipe for the burner mining drill.
recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)

# Print out the recipe details to confirm what materials are needed for crafting.
print(f'Recipe for Burner Mining Drill: {recipe}')
